long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GG EZ Task is a Quick To Do & Tab Saver productivity extension for Google Chrome that makes it easy to save and manage to-do items and tab links. With a simple and intuitive interface, you can add to-do items and save the URLs of the tabs you're working on. This extension also allows you to easily delete individual items or clear your entire list with a double-click. All your data is stored locally in your browser, ensuring your information stays private and secure.
